import Logo from '../logo/logo' import select from './select.svg' import './landingPage.css' const LandingPage = () => { const isOnScreen = (el) => { alert(el.getBoundingClientRect().y < window.scrollY) return (el.getBoundingClientRect().y < window.scrollY) ? false : true; } const clickNav = (e) => { document.querySelectorAll(".nav a li").forEach(el => { if (el.classList.contains('active')) el.classList.toggle('active') }) if (!e.target.classList.contains('active')) e.target.classList.toggle('active') } setTimeout(()=>{ document.querySelectorAll('.counter').forEach(el => { if (isOnScreen(el) === true){ alert('isOnScreen') } }) },500) return ( <>
